projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, payment processing, shopping cart functionality, and admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application that provides real-time weather data with beautiful visualizations, 7-day forecasts, and location-based weather tracking for multiple cities worldwide.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, team collaboration features, deadline tracking, and progress visualization charts.

projects.name: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: An analytics dashboard for social media management with post scheduling, engagement tracking, follower analytics, and multi-platform integration for content creators.

projects.name: Recipe Finder App
projects.description: A recipe discovery application with ingredient-based search, nutritional information, cooking timers, meal planning features, and personal recipe collection management.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with React, featuring smooth animations, dark/light mode toggle, contact forms, and optimized performance for showcasing projects.
